snippet: As corporations like Walmart speak out in opposition, Gov. Asa Hutchinson asked the state House to recall or amend a bill that critics say will allow discrimination against gays and lesbians.

byline.original: By CAMPBELL ROBERTSON and TIMOTHY WILLIAMS
byline.contributor: Campbell Robertson reported from Little Rock, and Richard Pérez-Peña from New York. Erik Eckholm and Richard Perez-Pena contributed reporting from New York, and Monica Davey from Indianapolis.

lead_paragraph: As corporations like Walmart speak out in opposition, Gov. Asa Hutchinson asked the state House to recall or amend a bill that critics say will allow discrimination against gays and lesbians.

headline.main: Arkansas Governor Asks Lawmakers to Recall Religious Exception Bill
headline.print_headline: Arkansas Governor Asks Lawmakers to Recall Religious Freedom Bill

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
